page.title: 15THE NORTH ISLES VET
page.content: Mr.Carstairs is the{vet}for the{outer {North Isles of Orkney.}There are a lot of farmers in the North Isles so he is kept pretty busy. His{day starts}very {early}& usually{finishes late}at night. He gets{a lot of calls in a {day,}often two at once - sometimes in the middle of the night. He{travels {between the islands}either on {chartered planes}or{fishing boats.}He has{friends}on all the islands who provide him with{transport}to get around the farms, & his{meals}when necessary. His{work}is{mostly {concerned with cattle & sheep - there are 20 000 cattle in the North Isles. He does{calving & lambing, TB {tests, injections,}etc. His{wife}takes care of the{accounts, records}&{phone {calls}when he is away from home. As well as this he also takes care of the Sanday folks' pets.
